Package alledrogo.tests.service

Class UserServiceTest

java.lang.Object
alledrogo.tests.service.UserServiceTest
public class UserServiceTest extends Object
Tests (Unit) for userServiceImpl. Creates @Mock and @InjectMocks to verify data handling by userServiceImpl and userRepository. Goal is to verify that each of these methods are working as intended (verification scenarios).
